Links to other online sources of data

  • Department of Agriculture and Cooperation, Ministry of Agriculture, Government of India

The statistics section of this website provides “Agricultural Statistics at a Glance” annually. Agricultural Statistics at a Glance provides national and State-level data on various aspects of agrarian economy.

  • RBI’s Database on Indian Economy

RBI’s database provides basic agricultural statistics. These are mainly taken from other sources. The RBI database has an easy interface for obtaining data.

  • Planning Commission’s Data Bank on Agriculture and Allied Sectors

Planning Commission also has a data bank that puts together data from various sources.
